title: Practical Training Based on the I-LEARN Model for Improving Information Literacy Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and comprehension at the general education level
context.additional_context: A process for in-company language practitioners to acquire information evaluation, analysis, and utilization skills to enhance work efficiency, emphasizing real-time collaborative learning using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply criteria for evaluating the credibility of diverse information sources with over 80% accuracy.
Learners systematically collect work-related information using structured research guides according to the I-LEARN model.
Learners reflect the process of judging the appropriateness of information sources in peer feedback and incorporate it 100% into the final report.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
